site.name: Teodor I.
site.title: Teodor I. - Development
site.tagline: I create websites that transform businesses, servers and projects and enhance user experiences. Specializing in XenForo, Wordpress, NamelessMC, Ghost, Tebex and CraftingStore, clients never leave unsatisfied.

services.title: Transforming Ideas into Intelligent Solutions
services.description: I offer a range of specialized services focused on artificial intelligence and modern web development to help businesses innovate and grow.

aiDevelopment.title: AI Development
aiDevelopment.description: Custom AI solutions tailored to your business needs with state-of-the-art models and algorithms

machineLearning.title: Machine Learning
machineLearning.description: Predictive models that grow smarter over time using your data to deliver actionable insights

dataAnalysis.title: Data Analysis
dataAnalysis.description: Transform your raw data into actionable insights with advanced visualization techniques

chatbotDevelopment.title: Chatbot Development
chatbotDevelopment.description: Intelligent conversational interfaces that provide natural, helpful interactions for your users

fullStackDevelopment.title: Full-Stack Development
fullStackDevelopment.description: End-to-end web and mobile solutions built with modern frameworks and best practices

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.description: Explore some of my recent work showcasing AI integration, machine learning implementation, and full-stack development.

aiContentGenerator.title: AI Content Generator
aiContentGenerator.description: A powerful AI tool that generates high-quality content for blogs, social media, and more.
aiContentGenerator.fullDescription: This AI-powered content generator uses advanced language models to create engaging, SEO-optimized content for various platforms. The tool features customizable tone settings, keyword optimization, and multiple export options.

virtualAssistant.title: Virtual Assistant Dashboard
virtualAssistant.description: An intuitive dashboard for managing AI virtual assistants and automating workflows.
virtualAssistant.fullDescription: This comprehensive dashboard allows users to create, train, and deploy virtual assistants for customer service, lead generation, and internal processes. The system includes analytics, conversation history, and integration capabilities.

predictiveAnalytics.title: Predictive Analytics Platform
predictiveAnalytics.description: A data visualization and prediction platform for business intelligence.
predictiveAnalytics.fullDescription: This platform transforms complex business data into actionable insights through interactive visualizations and AI-powered predictions. Features include customizable dashboards, automated reporting, and anomaly detection.

documentProcessor.title: Smart Document Processor
documentProcessor.description: An AI system that extracts, categorizes, and summarizes information from documents.
documentProcessor.fullDescription: This document processing system uses computer vision and natural language processing to automatically extract key information from various document types, including invoices, contracts, and reports. The system categorizes information and generates concise summaries.

sentimentAnalysis.title: Sentiment Analysis Tool
sentimentAnalysis.description: A real-time sentiment analysis tool for social media and customer feedback.
sentimentAnalysis.fullDescription: This tool monitors social media platforms and customer feedback channels to provide real-time sentiment analysis. Features include trend detection, alert systems for negative sentiment spikes, and detailed reporting.

recommendationEngine.title: AI-Powered Recommendation Engine
recommendationEngine.description: A sophisticated recommendation system for e-commerce and content platforms.
recommendationEngine.fullDescription: This recommendation engine uses collaborative filtering, content-based analysis, and contextual information to deliver highly relevant product or content recommendations. The system continuously learns from user interactions to improve suggestions.

experience.title: Professional Journey
experience.description: A timeline of my career progression and key roles in the technology and AI space.

seniorAiEngineer.title: Senior AI Engineer
seniorAiEngineer.description: Lead the development of AI solutions for enterprise clients. Designed and implemented custom machine learning models and natural language processing systems.

mlSpecialist.title: Machine Learning Specialist
mlSpecialist.description: Developed predictive analytics solutions and recommendation systems. Worked with large datasets to train and optimize machine learning models.

fullStackDeveloper.title: Full-Stack Developer
fullStackDeveloper.description: Built responsive web applications and RESTful APIs. Implemented front-end interfaces and back-end systems for various client projects.

softwareIntern.title: Software Engineering Intern
softwareIntern.description: Assisted in the development of mobile applications and web services. Gained experience in agile development methodologies and software testing.

pricing.title: Investment Plans
pricing.description: Transparent pricing options designed to accommodate different project scopes and requirements.

basic.title: Basic
basic.description: Perfect for small projects and startups

reviews.title: Client Feedback
reviews.description: Hear what clients have to say about their experience working with me.

sarahJohnson.name: Sarah Johnson
sarahJohnson.review: Working with this freelancer was an absolute pleasure. They delivered our AI solution ahead of schedule and exceeded our expectations in terms of functionality and performance.

michaelChen.name: Michael Chen
michaelChen.review: The custom recommendation engine they built for our e-commerce platform increased our conversion rates by 35%. Their expertise in AI and machine learning is truly impressive.

emilyRodriguez.name: Emily Rodriguez
emilyRodriguez.review: Their ability to translate complex technical concepts into practical business solutions is remarkable. The predictive analytics dashboard they created has become an essential tool for our decision-making process.

davidKim.name: David Kim
davidKim.review: We've worked with many developers, but none have matched the combination of technical skill and business understanding that this freelancer brings to the table. Highly recommended!

contact.title: Let's Work Together
contact.description: Have a project in mind? Reach out through any of these channels and I'll get back to you promptly.
